'''Heart of the Spring''' is an [[Event Item]] obtained during the "[[Wishful Drops]]" event.

It is obtained after the completion of Exploration Area in [[Wishful Drops#Endora's Education|Endora's Education]]. It can be used in place of [[Original Resin]] to claim the rewards from the [[Rhodeia's Rage]] Challenge.
